content: In 2019, which South Korean film directed by Bong Joon-ho won the Palme d'Or at Cannes Film Festival and later the Academy Award for Best Picture?

The South Korean film you're referring to is "Parasite," directed by Bong Joon-ho. It indeed won the Palme d'Or at the 2019 Cannes Film Festival and went on to win the Academy Award for Best Picture at the 92nd Academy Awards in 2020. This film is notable for being the first non-English language film to win the Best Picture award in the history of the Oscars.
